attributes.action: Persuade The Pipettes To Record "By My Side"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned request that the groovy Gordo suggests to Brighton based pop band The Pipettes that they should reconsider their decision not to record, for posterity, the Song "By My Side"
We further submit this would boost the nations morale and make up for the sunshine we have missed these summer months

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
